com.tomtom.speedtools.services.sms.implementation.nexmo

Interface NexmoResource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NexmoResourceMock

    @Path(value="/sms/json")
 @Produces(value={"application/json","application/xml"})
public interface NexmoResource
    Resteasy resource to call the Nexmo REST api. Currently only supports sending simple text messages. Parameters for vcards, vcals, etc, have been omitted (they are optional). The baseUrl can be obtained using the property SMSProvider.Nexmo.baseUrl.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.jboss.resteasy.client.ClientResponse<NexmoMessageResponse> sendMessage(String userName, String password, String from, String to, String type, String text, String statusReportRequired, Long clientReference)
      This operation sends an SMS text message using Nexmo.

    • Method Detail

      • sendMessage

        @GET
org.jboss.resteasy.client.ClientResponse<NexmoMessageResponse> sendMessage(@Nonnull @QueryParam(value="username")
                                                                                String userName,
                                                                                @Nonnull @QueryParam(value="password")
                                                                                String password,
                                                                                @Nonnull @QueryParam(value="from")
                                                                                String from,
                                                                                @Nonnull @QueryParam(value="to")
                                                                                String to,
                                                                                @Nullable @QueryParam(value="type")
                                                                                String type,
                                                                                @Nullable @QueryParam(value="text")
                                                                                String text,
                                                                                @Nullable @QueryParam(value="status-report-req")
                                                                                String statusReportRequired,
                                                                                @Nullable @QueryParam(value="client-ref")
                                                                                Long clientReference)
        This operation sends an SMS text message using Nexmo.
        Parameters:
        userName - Your API Key. Ex: username=n3xm0rocks.
        password - Your API Secret. Ex: password=12ab34cd.
        from - Sender address could be alphanumeric (Ex: from=MyCompany20), restrictions may apply depending on the destination.
        to - Mobile number in international format and one recipient per request. Ex: to=447525856424 or to=00447525856424 when sending to UK.
        type - This can be omitted text (default), unless sending a Binary (binary), WAP Push (wappush), Unicode message (unicode), vcal (vcal) or vcard (vcard). This should be of an enum type, however, resteasy seems to ignore the annotations, and uses the java name as string (in capitals in this case), which is not correct.
        text - Body of the text message (with a maximum length of 3200 characters), UTF-8 encoded. Ex: text=Hello+World!
        statusReportRequired - Set to 1 if you want to receive a delivery report (DLR) for this request. Make sure
        clientReference - Client reference number.
        Returns:
        Response.
